title: Bembe (1990) Genesis Portion
description: Bembe translation of the first four chapters of Genesis published 1990 by the Bible Society of Zaire. Bembe, also called Ebembe or Ibembe, is a Bantu language of the Democratic Republic of the Congo and Western Tanzania

language.name: Bembe
language.area: Sud-Kivu Province, Fizi Territory, west of Lake Tanganyika. Also in Tanzania.
